trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class that Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) derives from <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to do serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 表示抽象類別，這是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 為了要執行序列化和還原序列化而衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: You can derive from this class to do other functions than serialization.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從這個類別衍生類別來執行除了序列化以外的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is a known issue with the normalization of linefeed characters inside of CDATA sections that you may encounter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您可能會在正規化 CDATA 區段中的換行字元時遇到問題，而這是個已知問題。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Invoked only by its derived classes because this class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個類別是抽象的，所以只能叫用其衍生類別。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Its derived classes can override to return <see langword="true" /> if they support canonicalization.
trans-unit.target: 如果其衍生類別支援標準化，則可以覆寫它們來傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.

Returns `true` if and only if this derived class of <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> can canonicalize the XML content being written to it, according to the Exclusive XML Canonicalization rules as defined in [Exclusive XML Canonicalization Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96655).
trans-unit.target: 傳回`true`如果且只有這衍生的類別<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>可以規範化寫入它，根據獨佔標準化 」 XML 規則中所定義的 XML 內容[獨佔 XML 規範化版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96655).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that writes WCF binary XML format.
trans-unit.target: 建立寫入 WCF 二進位 XML 格式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The binary format only supports one text node as the attribute value and therefore buffers the values written to it to emit a single node, as shown in the following sample code.
trans-unit.target: 二進位格式僅支援一個當做屬性值的文字節點，因此會緩衝處理寫入至其中的值來發出單一節點，如下列範例程式碼所示。

trans-unit.source: In the previous sample the code buffers about 1 GB of memory, while in the other writers it writes the values as they are provided.
trans-unit.target: 在上面範例中，程式碼緩衝處理了約 1 GB 的記憶體，而在其他寫入器中則依照提供的值寫入。

trans-unit.source: The stream to write to.
Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that writes WCF binary XML format.
trans-unit.target: 建立寫入 WCF 二進位 XML 格式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.
The stream to write to.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionary" /> to use as the shared dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 要用來做為共用字典的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that writes WCF binary XML format.

trans-unit.target: 建立寫入 WCF 二進位 XML 格式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.
The stream from which to read.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中讀取的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionary" /> to use as the shared dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 要用來做為共用字典的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlBinaryWriterSession" /> to use.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the stream is closed by the writer when done; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示寫入器會在完成時關閉資料流；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that writes WCF binary XML format.
trans-unit.target: 建立寫入 WCF 二進位 XML 格式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.
An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> from an existing <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 從現有的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 建立 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.
<paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that writes XML in the Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) format.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 的執行個體，這個執行個體會使用訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM) 格式寫入 XML。

trans-unit.source: MTOM allows users to optimize the transmission of raw binary data within SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 可讓使用者最佳化 SOAP 訊息內之原始二進位資料的傳輸。

trans-unit.source: The stream to write to.
The character encoding of the stream.
The maximum number of bytes that are buffered in the writer.
trans-unit.target: 在寫入器內緩衝處理的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: An attribute in the ContentType SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: ContentType SOAP 標頭中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that writes XML in the MTOM format.
trans-unit.target: 建立採用 MTOM 格式寫入 XML 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.
The stream to write to.
The character encoding of the stream.
The maximum number of bytes that are buffered in the writer.
trans-unit.target: 在寫入器內緩衝處理的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The content-type of the MIME part that contains the Infoset.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Infoset 之 MIME 部分的 Content-Type。

trans-unit.source: The MIME boundary in the message.
trans-unit.target: 訊息中的 MIME 界限。

trans-unit.source: The content-id URI of the MIME part that contains the Infoset.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Infoset 之 MIME 部分的 Content-ID URI。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to write message headers.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示寫入訊息標頭。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the stream is closed by the writer when done; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示寫入器會在完成時關閉資料流；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that writes XML in the MTOM format.
trans-unit.target: 建立採用 MTOM 格式寫入 XML 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 執行個體。

The text writer writes the XML in UTF-8 format.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器會以 UTF-8 格式寫入 XML。

The character encoding of the output.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.

When implemented by a derived class, it stops the canonicalization started by the matching <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.StartCanonicalization(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.String[])" /> call.
trans-unit.target: 經衍生類別實作之後，它會停止對應之 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.StartCanonicalization(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.String[])" /> 呼叫所啟動的標準化。

trans-unit.source: This method is not yet implemented.
Method is not implemented yet.
The stream to write to.
<see langword="true" /> to include comments; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含註解，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The prefixes to be included.
When implemented by a derived class, it starts the canonicalization.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別實作時，它會啟動規範化。

trans-unit.source: This method is not yet implemented.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> < 0 或 > <paramref name="array" /> 長度減去 <paramref name="offset" />。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix.
The local name of the element.
The namespace URI of the element.
The array that contains the nodes.
The starting index in the array.
The number of nodes to get from the array.
trans-unit.target: 要從陣列取得的節點數目。

trans-unit.source: Writes nodes from a <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 陣列寫入節點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="count" /> is < 0 or > <paramref name="array" /> length minus <paramref name="offset" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> < 0 或 > <paramref name="array" /> 長度減去 <paramref name="offset" />。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix.
The local name of the element.
The namespace URI of the element.
The array that contains the nodes.
The starting index in the array.
The number of nodes to get from the array.
trans-unit.target: 要從陣列取得的節點數目。

trans-unit.source: Writes nodes from a <see cref="T:System.Single" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Single" /> 陣列寫入節點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="count" /> is < 0 or > <paramref name="array" /> length minus <paramref name="offset" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> < 0 或 > <paramref name="array" /> 長度減去 <paramref name="offset" />。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix.
The local name of the element.
The namespace URI of the element.
The array that contains the nodes.
The starting index in the array.
The number of nodes to get from the array.
trans-unit.target: 要從陣列取得的節點數目。

trans-unit.source: Writes nodes from a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 陣列寫入節點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="count" /> is < 0 or > <paramref name="array" /> length minus <paramref name="offset" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> < 0 或 > <paramref name="array" /> 長度減去 <paramref name="offset" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes an attribute qualified name and value.
trans-unit.target: 寫入屬性限定名稱和值。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
The namespace URI of the attribute.
The attribute.
Writes an attribute qualified name and value.
trans-unit.target: 寫入屬性限定名稱和值。

trans-unit.source: The prefix of the attribute.
The local name of the attribute.
The namespace URI of the attribute.
The attribute.
Writes an attribute qualified name and value.
trans-unit.target: 寫入屬性限定名稱和值。

trans-unit.source: Byte array to encode.
The position in the buffer indicating the start of the bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中的位置指示要寫入的位元組開頭。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write.
Asynchronously encodes the specified binary bytes as Base64 and writes out the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步的方式將指定的二進位位元組編碼為 base64 並寫出產生的文字。

trans-unit.source: The task that represents the asynchronous <see langword="WriteBase64" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步 <see langword="WriteBase64" /> 作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，您必須設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A>旗標設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在未將 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> 旗標設為 <see langword="true" />的情況下呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlWriterSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，就會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 並顯示訊息「如果您要使用非同步方法，請將 XmlWriterSettings.Async 設為 true」。

trans-unit.source: Writes an element with a text content.
trans-unit.target: 寫入具有文字內容的項目。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
The namespace URI of the element.
The element content.
Writes an element with a text content.
trans-unit.target: 寫入具有文字內容的項目。

trans-unit.source: The prefix of the element.
The local name of the element.
The namespace URI of the element.
The element content.
Writes an element with a text content.
trans-unit.target: 寫入具有文字內容的項目。

trans-unit.source: Writes the current XML node from a given <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> or <see langword="XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> 或 <see langword="XmlReader" /> 寫入目前的 XML 節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" />.
<see langword="true" /> to copy the default attributes from the <see langword="XmlReader" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要從 <see langword="true" /> 複製預設屬性，則為 <see langword="XmlReader" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the current XML node from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> 寫入目前的 XML 節點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
<see langword="true" /> to copy the default attributes from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要從 <see langword="true" /> 複製預設屬性，則為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the current XML node from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 寫入目前的 XML 節點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The local name of the qualified name.
The namespace URI of the qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 限定名稱的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the namespace-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 寫出命名空間限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method looks up the prefix that is in scope for the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會查詢在指定之命名空間範圍中的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: If the namespace maps to the current default namespace, no prefix is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名空間對應至目前的預設命名空間，則不會產生前置詞。

trans-unit.source: When writing attribute values, this method generates a prefix if the namespace is not found.
trans-unit.target: 在寫入屬性值時，如果找不到命名空間，這個方法會產生前置詞。

trans-unit.source: When writing element content, it throws an exception if the namespace is not found.
trans-unit.target: 在寫入項目內容時，如果找不到命名空間，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="localName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
When overridden in a derived class, writes the start of an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫入屬性的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
The namespace URI of the attribute.
Writes the start of an attribute with the specified local name, and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 寫入具有指定之本機名稱和命名空間 URI 之屬性的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix.
The local name of the attribute.
The namespace URI of the attribute.
Writes the start of an attribute with the specified prefix, local name, and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 寫入具有指定之前置詞、本機名稱和命名空間 URI 之屬性的開頭。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the specified start tag.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫入指定的開頭標記。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
The namespace URI of the element.
Writes the specified start tag and associates it with the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 寫入指定的開頭標記，並使它與指定的命名空間產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: The writer is closed.
The prefix of the element.
The local name of the element.
The namespace URI of the element.
Writes the specified start tag and associates it with the given namespace and prefix.
trans-unit.target: 寫入指定的開頭標記，並使它與指定的命名空間及前置詞產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: The writer is closed.
The text to write.
Writes the given text content.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> to get the text value from.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中取得文字值的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the reader is positioned on an attribute value or element content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示讀取器位於屬性值或項目內容上，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the text node that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> is currently positioned on.
trans-unit.target: 寫入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> 目前所在的文字節點。

trans-unit.source: If positioned on element content, this method advances the XmlDictionaryReader.
trans-unit.target: 如果置於項目內容上，這個方法會將 XmlDictionaryReader 的讀取位置往前移。

trans-unit.source: Writes a single simple-typed value.
trans-unit.target: 寫入單一簡單類型的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> value to write.
Writes a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> value.
The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value to write.
Writes a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.IStreamProvider" /> value to write.
Writes a value from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.IStreamProvider" />.
The contents of the stream provided by the `IStreamProvider` are written as Base64 data, unless this method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的資料流內容`IStreamProvider`除非在衍生類別中覆寫這個方法會寫為 Base64 資料。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.WriteValueAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.WriteValueAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="value" /> returns a <see langword="null" /> stream object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 會傳回 <see langword="null" /> 資料流物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The Unique Id value to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的唯一識別碼值。

trans-unit.source: Writes a Unique Id value.
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> value.
Writes a <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> value.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.IStreamProvider" /> value to write.
Asynchronously writes a value from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.IStreamProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 非同步寫入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.IStreamProvider" /> 中的值。

trans-unit.source: The task that represents the asynchronous <see langword="WriteValue" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步 <see langword="WriteValue" /> 作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.WriteValue%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 這是非同步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.WriteValue%2A>，使用相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，您必須設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A>旗標設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在未將 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> 旗標設為 <see langword="true" />的情況下呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlWriterSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，就會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 並顯示訊息「如果您要使用非同步方法，請將 XmlWriterSettings.Async 設為 true」。

trans-unit.source: Writes a standard XML attribute in the current element.
trans-unit.target: 在目前項目中寫入標準 XML 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A standard XML attribute is one with the prefix "xml" in any casing.
trans-unit.target: 標準 XML 屬性是具有前置詞 "xml" (大小寫不拘) 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Examples are `xml:space` and `xml:lang`.
The local name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
Writes a standard XML attribute in the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在目前節點中寫入標準 XML 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
Writes an XML attribute in the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在目前節點中寫入 XML 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Writes a namespace declaration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 寫入命名空間宣告屬性。

trans-unit.source: The prefix that is bound to the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至指定之命名空間的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The namespace to which the prefix is bound.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞所繫結至的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Writes a namespace declaration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 寫入命名空間宣告屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The prefix that is bound to the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至指定之命名空間的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The namespace to which the prefix is bound.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞所繫結至的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Writes a namespace declaration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 寫入命名空間宣告屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
